txt.en: This mark is awarded to those fighting in the Odothuilan campaign, mainly for completing encounters. This campaign consists of The Icy Crevasse and Attack At Dawn.\n\nThese can be redeemed for unique rewards at the Light, Medium and Heavy Armour vendors, as well as Jewellery and Cloaks vendor.  They may also be redeemed for Skirmish Marks at the Skirmish Exchange vendor.
